title: Wrong tab in focus after pulling different tab away
content:
If I have many tabs open, and pull one away, instead of the previous tab saying in focus, it clicks to a different tab.

If I have 5 tabs open:

  1. Tab1
  2. Tab 2
  3. Tab 3
  4. Tab 4
  5. Tab 5

I'm focused on Tab 3. If I pull Tab 5 away, it snaps me into Tab 4 even though I was previously on a different tab.

I think this isn't a bug but not desired?

title: can't access email
content: I can no longer log into my account. It says, "Application error: A client side exception has occurred." It wants me to go to a console, which I don't know what that is; I've looked everywhere for such a thing and it keeps bringing me back to a get help section that doesn't address the above-message. There's no 'chat with an agent' and no phone number. I've tried everything. You won't be able to respond to my email because it won't let me in; it says that my password is wrong, and I know it's the right password. It won't even let me change my password, and, if it even did, I wouldn't be able to access the email to change it. Please help. You'll have to call my phone number or access me some other way. I am completely locked out of any way to get help.

title: Bookmarks for Amazon showing full address for the Title

Love Firefox! PS: I'm a Firefox "Power User" when it comes to Bookmarks. I have over 8000 bookmarks and regularly back them up. I have some other suggestions regarding Bookmarks in Firefox if you are interested. Regard, K
